description: Explicitly states how the receiving party is allowed to use the disclosed confidential information.
output_format: Use only for purpose | Internal evaluation only | Cannot use commercially | Use for specified project

description: Requires the receiving party to return or destroy the confidential information upon request or at the end of the agreement term.
output_format: Destroy | Return | Certify destruction | None | Other

description: Allows the receiving party to use 'residual' information retained in unaided memory of its personnel who had authorized access.
Grants the disclosing party broad rights to use any feedback, suggestions, or ideas provided by the receiving party.
Identifies whether confidentiality obligations apply to both parties or only to one party.
Specifies whether the definition of 'Disclosing Party' or 'Receiving Party' includes their respective affiliated companies.
Specifies the penalties for a breach of the agreement.
